Title: Peace of Mind
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Leonard Chang, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: When Drew Thompson asks to change his deal to provide safety for Ellen Mae, the race on to see which side can get to her first.
